rachel_boyce.portfolio
X

fiction - perception

WilliamBot

A Twitter bot resurrecting the philosopher William James. Click here for more information.

X

fiction - expression

R Oast Beest

An alternate reality digital persona. Active on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram.

X

fiction - biohacking

Brainworms Radio

A futuristic variety show, emanating from the local transmetropolitan underground of WMBR 88.1fm Cambridge.

X

fiction - transmittance

Alright Eros

A dynamic dating website prank. After signing up, a user's account is "hacked" and they are informed about how to keep their personal and financial data more secure. Inspired by the Heartbleed data leak.

X

perception - expression

Time Ten Times

This visual love poem explores anticipation and the fourth dimension through a series of gifs.

X

perception - biohacking

chrysal IS

Interactive micro-environment in which LEDs respond to a participant's heart beat via an Arduino pulse sensor. Chrysal IS encourages quiet reflection in a peaceful personal space, and invites re-connection with the body's soothing rhythms.

X

perception - transmittance

Rain Bleep

A participatory immersive micro-environment in which projected animated textures collide with a string sculpture to generate a playful rainshower of sensory stimuli. In collaboration with Courtney Jane Lippincott. Click here for video.

X

expression - biohacking

Chromodynamics Project

A series of interactive installations, workshops, and paintings that manipulated the senses using monochromatic LED lighting and various pigments. In collaboration with Nathan Lachenmyer.

X

expression - transmittance

DocShop

Member of a collective at Harvard metaLab that has collaborated on a number of workshops interrogating the future of archive, interactive documentary, and emerging media.

X

biohacking - transmittance

DIY Bio

Photography and bioluminescent algae husbandry, in collaboration with Boston Open Science Lab.

X

fiction - real/virtual

Proprietary Career Institute

Satirical website created to bring attention to the issue of predatory practices in the education industry. In collaboration with Team 7, for the DataLore Hackathon.

X

perception - real/virtual

ASMR Bathroom, Braingasm Remix

A series of AV installations that immersed visitors in autonomous sensory meridian response. Speakers were in hidden locations such that visitors were not immediately aware of the audio, and thus discovered ASMR indirectly.

X

expression - real/virtual

annotatAR

Lo-fi augmented reality for the mobile web. Twitter data is geolocated so that when a participant opens the website at a particular location, tweets are overlaid on a video feed of the physical place that the event is occurring.

X

biohacking - real/virtual

Small World

Interactive installation in which participants influence the behavior of computational organisms projected onto a volumetric mist environment.

X

transmittance - real/virtual

Tune Glue

Web application that assists with planning a DJ set based on mixing in key.
